ModInfo.Name: German Weapons Pack
ModInfo.Author: PaulJay
ModInfo.Description:
This mods adds some interesting German weapons of Cold War era.
It includes an MP5 (weapon.gw_submachinegun) a G3 (weapon.gw_battlerifle) and an MG3 (weapon.gw_machinegun). The images for the G3 and MG3 were derived from images provided by the original game (Xenonauts by Goldhawk Interactive).
